TextString.Name: CyclicQuestServeDescription
TextString.String: Serve customers to increase your skill points. This quest is cyclic: once completed it will reactivate with increased requirements.

TextString.Name: CyclicQuestPrepareRecipesDescription
TextString.String: Prepare Recipes to gain Ingredient Points. This quest is cyclic: once completed it will reactivate with increased requirements.

TextString.Name: CyclicQuestCustomRecipesDescription
TextString.String: Prepare Custom Recipes to gain Ingredient and Skill Points. This quest is cyclic: once completed it will reactivate with increased requirements.

TextString.Name: CyclicQuestGetReviewsDescription
TextString.String: Gain Reviews scored 4 stars or more to get Skill Points. This quest is cyclic: once completed it will reactivate with increased requirements.

TextString.Name: CyclicQuestUseIngredientsDescription
TextString.String: Use several ingredients in your Recipes to gain Skill Points. This quest is cyclic: once completed it will reactivate with increased requirements.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialReward
TextString.String: By completing this task you will advance in the tutorial.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialOpenFurnishingDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Furnishing Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Furnishing Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialCounterDescription
TextString.String: Use the Furnishing Panel to place a Counter in the Kitchen.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialCookerDescription
TextString.String: Use the Furnishing Panel to place a Cooker in the Kitchen.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialTablesDescription
TextString.String: Use the Furnishing Panel to place at least 4 Tables in the Hall.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialMenuOpenDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Menu Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Menu Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialRecipesDescription
TextString.String: Add at least 10 Recipes on your menu to lure customers to your restaurant.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialStaffDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Staff Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Staff Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialWaiterDescription
TextString.String: Hire at least two Waiters to be able to serve customers

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialPoliciesEndOpenDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Policies and Decisions Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Policies and Decisions Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialDecisionsDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Decisions Button to open the Decisions Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialOpenPlaceDescription
TextString.String: Click on the respective decision to open your restaurant and start your career in the world of cooking.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialOpenChefAdvisorDescription
TextString.String: Click on the ChefAdvisor Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the ChefAdvisor Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialOpenSummaryDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Stats Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Stats Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialOpenCustomersDescription
TextString.String: Click on the button in the Summary Panel to open the Peoples Subpanel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialOpenSkillsDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Skills Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Skills Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialSpendSkillsDescription
TextString.String: Choose some Skills for your Chef and then confirm your choice.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialIngredientsOpenDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Ingredients Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Ingredients Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialIngredientPointsDescription
TextString.String: Choose some Ingredients for your restaurant and then confirm your choice.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialInfluenceOpenDescription
TextString.String: Click on the Map Panel button on the lower left area of the screen to open the Map Panel.

TextString.Name: QuestTutorialSpendInfluenceOpenDescription
TextString.String: Click on a District you like and then on the button in the panel on the right to spend a single Influence Point on that District

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefCustomRecipesDescription
TextString.String: You need a proper menu, filled with creation of yours. Open the Recipe Editor and unleash your creativity!

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefServeCustomFirstDescription
TextString.String: Let your customer enjoy your unique recipes.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGoodIngredientsDescription
TextString.String: You need to improve the quality of your offer, be sure to use Recipes made only with Tier 2 Ingredients.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefAwesomeRecipeDescription
TextString.String: Use your talent and your Ingredients to create a Recipe with a rating of at least 150.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefServeCustomSecondDescription
TextString.String: Let your customer enjoy your unique recipes.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGetFirstStarDescription
TextString.String: To get your the First WebGuide Star you need to satisfy 100 Gourmet customers before the the Task expires.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGetFirstStarReward
TextString.String: A unique Perk increasing the number of Gourmets coming to your place.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefPerfectRecipeDescription
TextString.String: Use your talent and your Ingredients to create a Recipe with a rating of at least 200.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGetSecondStarDescription
TextString.String: To get your the Second WebGuide Star you need to satisfy 100 Gourmet customers before the the Task expires

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGetSecondStarReward
TextString.String: A unique Perk increasing the number of Gourmets coming to your place.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefAwesomeIngredientsDescription
TextString.String: You need to improve the quality of your offer, be sure to use Recipes made only with Tier 3 Ingredients.

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGetThirdStarDescription
TextString.String: To get your the Third WebGuide Star you need to satisfy 100 Gourmet customers before the the Task expires

TextString.Name: QuestStarChefGetThirdStarReward
TextString.String: A unique Perk increasing the number of Gourmets coming to your place.
